item.title: [BHS/GRA][Web Hosting] - Database upgrade maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 10, 08:00 UTC  -  Sep 30, 12:00 UTC

Jul 9, 16:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : A 1 minute downtime is expected.
Service improvement : We are going to upgrade MySQL 5.7 to MySQL 8.0. The upgrades will occur every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday.
The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure.

The maintenance work will be carried out in 2 phases.
The first phase will begin on:
Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 25/07/2024 12:00 UTC

The second phase will begin on:
Start time : 12/08/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Progress will be posted here.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:
Jul 9, 13:36 UTC

End time : 09/07/2024 13:20 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 8, 16:35 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams implemented a temporary fix.
Automatic SSL key regeneration for Let's Encrypt is available again.
Our technical teams are currently working on the definitive fix

Jul 8, 15:47 UTC
Identified - Root cause : Software issue
Workaround: Customers can manually regenerate SSL keys from the Manager
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made

Jul 8, 15:44 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/07/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Automatic SSL keys regeneration for Let's Encrypt is temporarily unavailable

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made

Start time : 02/07/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 02/07/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.
Please do not hesitate to contact us via our support channels with any questions or concerns.

item.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - ~userid access legacy feature removal
item.description:
Jun 24, 10:14 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 24, 08:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 13, 13:56 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed and has been successfully rescheduled.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 24/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 24/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.

May 16, 06:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 17/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.
